ui

Class YahtzeeRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.YahtzeeRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playable

    public class YahtzeeRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playable
    Author:
    Sara Wille The YahtzeeRules class manages play for a game of Yahtzee. The player rolls the Hand, then can choose to re-roll any combination of dice up to two more times on each turn. The game lasts for 13 turns. The score is calculated depending on the face up values of each Hand and the user's choice of which scoring category to use at the end of each turn.
